job_description:
StickerYou is a leading global e-commerce company for custom die-cut products such as stickers, labels, decals, temporary tattoos and more. Our proprietary platform infuses automation technology and creativity to empower anyone to make the best custom products in any size, shape and quantity. Business and consumers can make their marketing, packaging, décor or personal expression professional grade. We believe in the enormous power of customization. We are a smart, creative, and passionate group dedicated to growing the most talented and engaging people in Toronto, Canada. We are a global company utilizing software and advanced digital manufacturing. We proudly make custom products locally. We make what matters stick!

Position Summary:

Our next Software Developer will be a key addition to the team that will play an integral part in the evolution of the StickerYou platform. This person will report directly to the VP of Product and Technology and help accelerate the architecture and ongoing development of our leading edge StickerYou platform to better enable our B2C and B2B customers to design and order our products. Improving the tools our customers use and our internal systems to become more efficient are seen as key drivers to achieving our growth and profitability targets over the next few years. You’ll be joining a solid team of experienced developers who will be happy to share their business and technical knowledge with someone who can help them share, divide and conquer their ambitious objectives.

We’re modernizing our development platform and you’ll be play a part in helping to migrate the best of what we already have as well as building new products based on C# .NET Core, EF Core, JavaScript, Reactjs, MS SQL Server and Azure.

This role will appeal to someone who aspires to technical excellence who has a creative approach to new products and problem solving they are eager to apply to e-commerce and interactive customer facing solutions. As a self-driven, entrepreneurial developer we’re looking for someone as skilled (and happy) leading a project, working as part of a team or taking on complex individual challenges

Responsibilities

Work in a small team environment with Development and QA to execute software projects using Agile Scrum methodology.
Design, develop and support StickerYou web, windows and cloud applications utilizing modern web technologies: C# .NET Core, EF Core, MS SQL Server and Azure
Assist and drive development of use cases and tracking of always evolving requirements.
Work with the QA team to ensure accuracy and solution integrity.
Solve problems, analyze and weigh alternatives and determine the appropriate course of action.
Frequently communicate with colleagues to review progress
Participate in documenting technical solutions; provide technical training and mentoring to other development team members.

Qualifications

University degree or college diploma in Computer Sciences
Strong communication skills - both verbal and written
10+ years total experience including architecture, design and implementation of entire web and windows based .NET application with MS SQL Server
4+ years hands on development with C# and MVC ASP.NET or ASP.NET Core
3+ years with Entity Framework or other data access frameworks (recent EF Core would be a definite asset)
2+ years UI front-end event-driven JavaScript frameworks (ideally with React)
Proficiency with web technologies and principles including::HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, CSS, Bootstrap, cross-browser compatibility and SEO
Experience with Agile and Scrum
Demonstrated understanding of object oriented programming, software design patterns and development best practices
Experience using Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 or 2019
Experience working with team productivity tools like Subversion, Git, Jira, Confluence/Wiki
A solid understanding of on-premise and on-cloud paradigms

Experience with the following is not required but will be considered assets:

Microsoft Azure Storage, Azure Serverless, Azure App Platform,
DevOps, CD/CI, Unit and Integration Testing
Experience integrating with third party APIs: Sendgrid, PayPal API, Payment Processors, etc
Experience working with PDF documents and any third party libraries
Microservices Architecture and Implementations, DDD Modeling, Eventing
Familiarity with graphical design tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator

StickerYou is committed to the health and safety of all our employees, visitors and community members. All employees, contractors and visitors who work on-site in StickerYou oﬃces, retail and production locations will be required to show proof of vaccination status from a Health Canada approved COVID-19 Vaccination. Accommodations may be provided for those with valid medical exemptions and will be asked for valid proof of exemption status.

Diversity and Inclusion

StickerYou is strongly committed to Diversity and Inclusion and aims to create a healthy, accessible and rewarding work environment which highlights employees’ unique contributions to our company’s success. If you require accommodation for the recruitment or interview process, please let us know and we will work with you to meet your needs

As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome applications from all to help us build a diverse workforce which reflects the diversity of our customers, and communities, in which we live and serve.
